Description: Sheet of papyrus with 6 lines of Coptic text written along the fibres (recto) on one side, and one line of Coptic written along the fibres (verso, at 90 degree angle to other side) on the other. Mounted with EA 75339.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380758) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380758)
